data.title: International Freight Forwarder
data.meta_description: Get international freight forwarding and logistics services including air freight, truck, rail, and ocean transport from One Global Family operating in more than 70 countries.
data.text:
Our Solutions

Operating from a network of more than 150 offices worldwide, Fracht Group is an NVOCC (Non-Vessel-Operating Common Carrier) as well as a traditional freight forwarder. We are an industry leader in providing general and specialized logistics solutions and multimodal freight transport.

View All Solutions

Industries

Fracht supports a global customer base working in countless industries. This experience helps us align to the logistical needs particular to those industries: what they ship, by what modes, and with what cargo- and delivery-specific considerations.

Automotive

Energy and Industrial

Defense and Government

Aid and Relief

View All Industries

Fracht Forward

Fracht Group is committed to improving, increasing, and expanding our sustainability strategy across all areas of the business, in alignment to the United Nations’ Sustainable Development Goals. Our Fracht Forward program puts this commitment into action to create a better future for our local communities, the environment, and society as a whole.

Learn More

Inter Miami CF Partnership

Fracht Group is a Main Partner of the Inter Miami CF MLS team. Our logo appears on the sleeve of the team’s official match jersey, but the heart of our partnership is community service: a shared commitment to sustainability and social responsibility that manifests in the alignment between our Fracht Forward initiatives and the work of the Inter Miami CF Foundation.

Learn More

Our success is built on the ability and commitment of our diverse global workforce. That's why we are so committed to the growth and development of our people. There are numerous openings across the organization—all characterized by opportunity for advancement in an atmosphere of integrity and respect.

Join Us
